<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script">
    <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <abort_action>false</abort_action>
        <access>package_private</access>
        <action_delete>false</action_delete>
        <action_insert>true</action_insert>
        <action_query>false</action_query>
        <action_update>true</action_update>
        <active>true</active>
        <add_message>false</add_message>
        <advanced>true</advanced>
        <change_fields>false</change_fields>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <collection>pa_thresholds</collection>
        <condition/>
        <description/>
        <execute_function>true</execute_function>
        <filter_condition/>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>PA Threshold Element</name>
        <order>50</order>
        <priority>100</priority>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[function onBefore(current, previous) {
	if (!current.breakdown || current.breakdown == '') {
		current.breakdown = '';
		current.element = '';
		current.breakdown_level2 = '';
		current.element_level2 = '';
		return;
	}
	
	if (!current.element || current.element == '') {
		current.element = 'unmatched';
	}
	
	var breakdownChanged = (current.breakdown != previous.breakdown);
	var elementChanged = (current.element != previous.element);
	if (breakdownChanged && !elementChanged) {
		current.element = 'unmatched';
	}
	
	if (!current.breakdown_level2 || current.breakdown_level2 == '') {
		current.element_level2 = '';
		return;
	}
	
	if (!current.element_level2 || current.element_level2 == '') {
		current.element_level2 = 'unmatched';
	}
	
	var breakdownL2Changed = (current.breakdown_level2 != previous.breakdown_level2);
	var elementL2Changed = (current.element_level2 != previous.element_level2);
	if (breakdownL2Changed && !elementL2Changed) {
		current.element_level2 = 'unmatched';
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-11-25 01:31:10</sys_created_on>
        <sys_domain>global</sys_domain>
        <sys_domain_path/>
        <sys_id>064c6912eb203100871aac6aa206fea9</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PA Threshold Element</sys_name>
        <sys_overrides/>
        <sys_package display_value="Performance Analytics" source="com.snc.pa">4069fc643cf1311068bcf327dfe37fe4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_064c6912eb203100871aac6aa206fea9</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-11-22 14:53:53</sys_updated_on>
        <template/>
        <when>before</when>
    </sys_script>
    <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=064c6912eb203100871aac6aa206fea9"/>
</record_update>
